Body: Possible Duplicate:  Can I install Android on my non-Android device?  I have searched more than one site trying to decide how to convert my Samsung Focus to an Android platform. I'm still wondering if such a process can be accomplished.
Title: Can I convert my Samsung Focus - SAMSUNG SGH-i917 to an Android platform?

history.Text: I have searched more than one site trying to decide how to convert my Samsung Focus to an Android platform. I'm still wondering if such a process can be accomplished.Please advise.Thanks,Maurice
